Blog.post: I just like to tell you a little about this group I started. This yahoo group was made so crafters like I can sell there crafts on line for no cost. There not a lot of websites to help crafts places there add for free,and craft show cost more then what you can sell your crafts for.Its like others are making lots more money for your crafts and not you and here you put more time and care into your craft,and you lucky to make a profit.As a crafter I have a website and has taken me a year to find a few free websites to place my craft website. Sad to say I'm haven't sold a thing on line.Hopefully with help of other crafters we can make a different and have people order from uses on line as well as going to craft show to buy handmade crafts and pay more for there crafts. I believe on line sales will benife both buyers and crafters. So Pleases join this yahoo group to buy or to sell your handmade craft from hardworking real live crafters. Thank You, Maria {All you have to do to join my Free ads to sell your Crafts Group click above "I started a yahoo group to help crafts sell there crafts on line!" and it will link you to my yahoo group enjoy.} Thank You, Maria {All you have to do to join my Free ads to sell your Crafts Group click above "I started a yahoo group to help crafters sell there crafts online!" and it will link you to my yahoo group injoy.}

I Like to tell you a little about my Website. My website has a lot of defent pages that show you my crafts and tell you a little about them. I also have Other link in my site like Online Games.& lots more Have a Website Profile That show a Photo of me and tells you a little about me. So Pleases take time to view all of my pages in my website will enjoy my website & find that my crafts are great to give your family,& freinds for the holidays.
To veiw my MSN group click " Maria's MSN Group" Above.
To veiw my yahoo group click " Maria's Yahoo Group"

I have many Pages full of all my crafts I make out plastic Canvas. Check them out the all make great gifts or great around the houses or car.Pleases fill free to contack my at anytime. {To veiw my site click Maria's Crafts Website above.} With a order you will get a free gift. I also have my other links like online games & places a ad link check it out. urlLink urlLink alt="Click for Williston, Vermont Forecast" height=60 width=468> urlLink
Pleases take a moment to view my website while you listen to gatheringofnations radio.

urlLink Free polls from Pollhost.com Do you buy handmade crafts for your self or for gifts! Yes for myself Yes for gifts No Im not shore where to buy them. Never thought of it. Don,t like handmade Crafts. urlLink
